home_overview: Passionate about creating intuitive and performant mobile experiences. 5+ years of experience building Android applications with modern technologies.
about_home_title: My objective when working on the project is to bring the best productivity and quality to customers. I also love to improve my skill and transfer my experience to everyone, which interested in developing software projects. Besides that, I always look for challenges and pass them.
subject: Subject
featured_project_describe: Here are some of my recent Android applications that showcase my skills in mobile development, UI/UX design, and modern Android technologies.
skill_overview: A comprehensive overview of my technical skills and proficiency levels in various Android development technologies and tools.
fan_description: Built entertainment apps with collections of fan sounds, white noise, asmr triggered by user actions.Added features like sound looping, favorites, and volume control, swipe to watch videos like reels
stickman_description: An app that lets users create stickman animations frame-by-frame with onion-skin support. Supporting export to GIF/MP4
thermal_description: Implemented a camera filter app that simulates thermal vision using OpenGL shaders and real-time color mapping.
prank_description: Built entertainment apps with collections of prank sounds (air horn, siren, fart, etc.) triggered by user actions. Sounds can created by Text to Speech, Voice Change
charging_description: Created an app that displays dynamic animations and battery statistics when the device is charging
plant_description: Built a mobile app that identifies plants from photos using AI server and external plant recognition APIs.
compass_description: Digital compass app displaying direction, degrees, and coordinates using magnetometer and accelerometer sensors.
stamp_description: Developed a camera/gallery tool to apply custom timestamps, watermarks, and location info onto photos and videos.
magnify_description: Created a magnifier app with real-time zoom and sharpening filters for text and objects.
renai_description: Fun photo-editing app that swaps user’s eyes/mouth into preset templates (e.g., classic paintings, memes)
